channel.title: Pitbull fights + Posting to Youtube
channel.description:
Should it be illegal to post pitbull fights on youtube? [size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt] Trained to kill[/size][/size][/size] .. [size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Horrible images[/size][/size][/size] .. [size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Short lives[/size][/size][/size] .. [size=10pt][size=10pt][size=10pt]Fight to the death[/size][/size][/size]
We allow dog fights for our own purpose, entertainment. Pitbulls are known for being aggresive, yet only gaurds. My nextdoor neighbors dog which isnt a pitbull, a trained doberman. When i went into my nextdoor neighbors house, it was only, keen to see what i was doing, and growling at me, for the protection of its family.
Heres a video i picked up from another thread
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D24igQxIfIY
Viscous or not?
Illegal to post actual pitbull fights to youtube or not?
DEBATE NOW

item.title: Pitbull fights + Posting to Youtube
item.dc:creator: @wewaka wewaka
item.description:
@wewaka wrote:

I think that pitbull fights are cruel and disturbing, those are what give pitbulls a bad name. The only type of dog fighting that isn’t bad is the japanese tosa inus because they don’t fight to kill

Read full topic

item.title: Pitbull fights + Posting to Youtube
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

Pits are nice to but the media only shows the bad

Read full topic

item.title: Pitbull fights + Posting to Youtube
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Those pitbulls used in fights are trained for it, so they are aggressive. We have a Doberman, which is supposed to be an aggressive dog, you see them a lot in movies as aggressive, but ours isn’t. It’s actually a cute dog, because we have it since I was a small boy and I cuddled it all day.

Read full topic

item.title: Pitbull fights + Posting to Youtube
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

There are none on youtube they banned it last year

Read full topic
